data.name: Label2.Text
data.value:
In the course of your treatment, West Metro Medical Center may process Personal Information, Sensitive Personal Information, and/or Privileged Information (collectively, “Personal Data”) relating to you and/or your contacts. Such processing of Personal Data may include its collection, recording, updating, modification, retrieval, use and retention. These Personal Data may include information which may be used to check your identity, personal circumstances, contact information, educational and medical background, and other information, which are relevant for the purpose of your diagnosis and treatment in the hospital
1.The processing of Personal Information, as provided under applicable laws, regulations, and the West Metro Medical Center’s policies and guidelines, for its affiliates’, related entities’ and partners’ legitimate purpose/s, including your testing, diagnosis and treatment.
2.Making your Personal Information, available to the Hospital, its affiliates, related entities and partners (including its service providers as well as members of its medical staff and doctors) and to permit the Hospital Related Entities to make your personal data available to (a) third parties who provide products and services to the Hospital and the Hospital Related Entities for the same purpose as described above; and (b) to other third parties (such as, but not limited to, the Department of Health, Philippine Health Insurance Corporation, your employer or your insurance provider), where required or permitted by law or contract, including regulatory authorities, government agencies, as well as parties with whom you voluntarily transact.
3.The processing of your Personal Information for medical training, research and education, as well as to generate statistical data relevant to the Hospital’s operations in order to aid the Hospital’s management team, board of directors and shareholders to review and analyze data relating to the Hospital’s operations and financial performance.
The Personal Information you provide will be retained by West Metro Medical Center for a period of 1 year or as long as necessary for a legitimate business purpose. Unless retention for a longer period is required for reasonable cause, the Personal Information shall, upon the lapse of the Personal Data Retention Period, be disposed of by West Metro Medical Center in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. You and your Contacts are entitled to certain rights in relation to the Personal Information that may be collected from you and your Contacts, including the right to access, correction, and to object to the processing of the same. A more detailed description of your rights under the Philippine Data Privacy Act of 2012, and its Implementing Rules and Regulations may be downloaded at HYPERLINK "http://www.privacy.gov.ph/"www.privacy.gov.ph You may consult the Hospital’s Data Protection Officer at 991–2506 local 200 for any concerns regarding your Personal Data.
